sentences.en: Edicts were issued against engrossing the market.
sentences.cn: 当时颁布过若干禁止囤积居奇的法令.

sentences.en: Engrossing fables of insights are exploited to embellish his essays and to persuade the emperor.
sentences.cn: 文章使用很多寓言故事,旨在生动有趣,使文章更精彩,更有说服力,从而打动君主.

sentences.en: He is an engrossing subject for a book.
sentences.cn: 他是非常有趣的写作素材。

sentences.en: He was methodical in his research, engrossing himself in Hellenic dramas and Norse mythology.
sentences.cn: 在对希腊戏剧与北欧神话的研究他非常细心.

sentences.en: It might soon have ripened into that engrossing feeling.
sentences.cn: 很快便会发展成那种压倒一切的感情的.

sentences.en: The act of engrossing or the state of being engrossed.
sentences.cn: 正式誊写的行为或状态.

sentences.en: They both thought of me, even at that engrossing time.
sentences.cn: 他们俩在那种黯然消魂的时刻还对我念念不忘.

sentences.en: What had been the engrossing world had dissolved into an uninteresting outer dumb - show.
sentences.cn: 那曾经趣味横生的世界,现在却已经变成兴味索然的哑剧.
